modName: Player Journal - Write a Pancake Tale
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]Requires lastest version of SKSE to work![/color][/b]
[b][color=red]Please make sure to set another key beside E to activate stuff when typing the book else bugs might occur![/color][/b]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/975445-journal-mod] Mod requested by Black Zero 500[/url]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36069-2-1368690310.png[/img]
This mod puts a Player Journal in Solitude (Watch the screenshot to see the exact location), this journal can be written by the player itself in-game.

Current working keys: 0-9, A-Z, Spacebar, Backspace, Semicolon, Minus, Linebreaker, period, comma.
Current max characters: 135

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36069-1-1368691250.png[/img][list]
[*] Possibility to name the Journal;
[*] Better way to refresh the screen;
[*] Possibility to add images.
[*] Possibility to sell it with a variable price depending on many variables rendering this both a journal or a possible book to write and sell (Writer carrier on skyrim?!)
[/list]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36069-2-1368691251.png[/img][List]
[*]Black Zero 500 - Mod requester
[/list]
author: Xilante
